column3: Can I interest you in some rock wrigglers? Plump, juicy, and wriggly! No? Is there something else I can help you with?
Very dark, very cool, the nights are. A good time for traveling, but a good time for flesh-eating predators, too!
Easier to see where you are going with all this Light, it is true. Still, no one needs <Emphasis>this</Emphasis> much Light, do they? Especially when you have Rhen Ren's advice to guide you!
Light and dark, night and day. All is in perfect balance! Happy times are here, but we must still be careful when crossing the desert.
What kind of place is this?
I am what we call a “middle Mord” between Twine and the Crystalline Mean. The Crystarium is too far away for most of the miners, so I buy their gemstones and ore and sell them for a higher price!
I only sell by the crate, so if you are looking for individual items, try the other merchants! They have many goods for travelers like you!
Garik was once a mining town. Until all of the miners moved out, that is!
They were kind enough to leave their houses for us Mord to use. And like we always say, “Waste not, want not!”
As you can see, there is not much here, but a lot of people traveling to and from the Crystarium pass through, mainly to rest or use our well. It is the closest thing this place has to an oasis!
